title: Dining Reservation
description: Collects all details specific to a dining reservation.

xdm:deliveryPartners.title: Delivery Partners
xdm:deliveryPartners.description: Delivery partners available from the restaurant.

xdm:diningOptions.title: Dining Options
xdm:diningOptions.description: Delivery and dining options available from the restaurant.

xdm:groupReservation.title: Group Reservation
xdm:groupReservation.description: Indicates if the reservation is being made for a group.

xdm:loyaltyID.title: Loyalty ID
xdm:loyaltyID.description: Includes the loyalty/rewards program ID for the party listed in the reservation.

xdm:partySize.title: Party Size
xdm:partySize.description: Number of individuals in the dining party.

xdm:priceCategory.title: Price Category
xdm:priceCategory.description: Price category for the reservation being made.

xdm:reservationTime.title: Reservation Time
xdm:reservationTime.description: The time for which the dining reservation is booked.

xdm:specialOccasion.title: Special Occasion
xdm:specialOccasion.description: Indicates if the reservation is being made for a special occasion.

xdm:status.title: Status
xdm:status.description: The status of the dining reservation.
